options: A synchronous motor with capacitor connected across stator terminals to improve PF
A synchronous motor operating at full load with leading PF
An over excited synchronous motor partially supplying mechanical load and also improving PF of the system to which it is connected
An over excited synchronous motor operating at no load with leading PF to improve the PF of the system
